execution_quality: High quality execution with systematic exploration, clear planning artifacts, and well-structured skill templates. Agent effectively translated architectural concepts into concrete implementation scaffolding.
work_category: Architecture planning and skill design for a multi-phase verification workflow system. Agent explored the codebase, created a comprehensive plan, and established the foundational skill structure with detailed guidelines.
summary: Agent successfully translated user's high-level concept (skills-based orchestration for multi-phase verification) into a structured plan with guidelines, skill stubs, and working group organization. The work was architecturally sound and well-communicated. User's follow-up message indicates partial alignment—they're adding important refinements about the verification workflow's tone and output format (persuasive evidence + tree-structured reporting), suggesting the initial design was a good foundation but incomplete in capturing quality/presentation requirements.
follow_up_pattern: User is iterating on the design requirements, adding new constraints (persuasiveness, evidence, code walkthroughs, reporting) and indicating they want to continue refining the approach before full implementation.
